name: DFC Consultants
description: DFC Consultants offers sales, implementation and support of Microsoft Dynamics GP, Dynamics CRM and DFC Property Management. As a Wennsoft Executive Partner, DFC also specializes in assisting companies with job cost and field service solutions. Along with software expertise, DFC offers cloud hosting, accounting services, custom programming and website development. DFC was founded in 1989 and services clients nationwide through their three offices in North Dakota.
